item.description:
On Monday nights Heritage Farm Ice Cream puts on FREE concerts across the street at The Sampas pavilion. They also sponsor a classic car show (begins at 6pm) -cars from days gone by.
Bring a chair or blanket ( and bug repellent) for the concert while the sun sets over the Merrimack River. It's a great night out! FREE Outdoor Concert On The River: The band “TSUNAMI OF SOUND”
*We will meetup at Heritage Farm - at the porch. I will have a meetup.com pin (or sign). Then, we can walk across to the Sampas Pavilion for the concert. If you show up later you can find us with a meetup sign in the back of either a chair or my hat.
You can purchase something from the Heritage Farm menu, ice cream, hot dogs, burgers, or beverage.... or you can bring your own snack. www.heritageicecream.com This is a shared event with other meetup groups.


WHERE THIS IS AN ALL-OUTDOOR EVENT, RAIN CANCELS. I will update as close to 6pm in the event the weather is questionable. You can reach me @ 978.289.7679 after 6:00.

 

“TSUNAMI OF SOUND”

TSUNAMI OF SOUND plays Huge surf-inspired instruments that will make your head shake and your feet move. The music they create is inspired by the Ventures, Los Straitjackets, Link Wray, the Fathoms, Laika and the Cosmonauts and all instrumental music. You’ll love them!!!
item.how_to_find_us: We all meetup on the porch @ Heritage Ice Cream.I'll be wearing a meetup pin. Or, call number provided in description

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: FREE Outdoor Concert On The River "TSUNAMI OF SOUND"
